message.content:
cs.IT, cs.LG, cs.SP, cs.NA, cs.SI. 

The paper discusses the use of convex regularizers for sparse recovery from linear measurements, which is a topic that falls under the sub-categories of information theory (cs.IT), machine learning (cs.LG), signal processing (cs.SP), numerical analysis (cs.NA), and systems and control (cs.SI). The paper specifically focuses on the optimality of the 1-norm regularization among weighted 1-norms for sparse recovery, which is a problem that is relevant to all of these sub-categories. Therefore, it is likely that the paper could be classified under any of these sub-categories, with cs.IT and cs.LG being the most likely due to the emphasis on information theory and machine learning.
